programme.title: El Gavilan Justiciero
programme.desc: Two families become intertwined in the bloodiest fight ever seen, where greed and ambition bring suffering to one family and the envy of the other.

programme.title: La Historia De Pedro Y Pablo
programme.desc: When Pedro and Pablo become orphaned, they have to separate so that one of them can study in order to have a better life. Pedro never imagined that in his sacrifice he would also lose the woman of his life.

programme.title: El Nuevo Narcotraficante
programme.desc: Octavio Beltrán rose out of poverty thanks to drug dealing. Obsessed with being the best, he defies his former boss, El Sultan, and takes over the complete business. But his new worst enemy is ready to fight back and use every tool possible to get back to the top of the criminal underworld.

programme.title: Las Caras Del Diablo 2
programme.desc: When a complex investigation implicates an ex Justice Minister and his family, detective Guzman has not other choice than free from prison his partner, inspector Pedro Ramirez, to crack the case. Now, Ramirez is back with a new mission that will become a personal challenge to him.

programme.title: Stranger
programme.desc: John and Rebecca drive up to a cabin in the woods near Idyllwild for some peace and quiet. A stranger becomes increasingly intrigued by their presence - little do they know, they'll soon be forced into a deadly game he's compelled to play.

programme.title: They Call Her Headhunter
programme.desc: The wife of a nefarious TV Evangelist hires a savage bounty hunter known as the Headhunter to kidnap her husband and inflict terrible pain before killing him off. But things are not all what they seem in the world of ‘saving lives’ as the Headhunter discovers a very dark and wicked secret inside this cult.

programme.title: My Stepbrother Is A Vampire
programme.desc: Nancy discovers her new stepbro may be a Vampire.

programme.title: Sed De Venganza
programme.desc: When an undercover agent's cover is blown and he's murdered with no mercy, nobody thought that their two young and beautiful daughters are trained to kill.

programme.title: El Bazukazo 2
programme.desc: After being left for dead, Edgar is rescued by a beautiful woman who works in the mafia. When Edgar recovers from his injuries, he joins the new team as an expert in handling weapons is needed.

programme.title: Los 7 Sellos De La Santa Muerte 2
programme.desc: After dismantling a powerful sect, the mysterious crimes continue and the police are dedicated to investigating who is the new leader of the organization to catch him and put an end to the violence.

programme.title: Dominium
programme.desc: Three friends want to film a documentary about urban legends. After they unexpectedly interrupt a strange ceremony at an cemetery, they meet a nurse who loves to install cameras wherever paranormal activities occur. Together they will unfold a horror as never seen before.

programme.title: Sex Game
programme.desc: Rachel and Ryan are two popular influencers who will do anything to get a few more likes and win the next virtual challenge.

programme.title: Pordioseros Y Ladrones
programme.desc: It seemed that Eduardo had it all, however, life turned its back on him after a betrayal that left him on the street. His godfather is a beggar who will confront the cartel that took absolutely everything from him.
